title.en: OpenAI unveils O4-Mini with faster deliberation
title.zh: OpenAI 发布 O4-Mini，强调更快的规划推理

summary.en: The new O4-Mini model focuses on short-horizon planning with tool calling baked in, offering better latency for production agents.
summary.zh: 新的 O4-Mini 模型强化短周期规划并内置工具调用，显著降低面向生产级 Agent 的响应延迟。

title.en: Anthropic shares latency benchmark suite for Claude agents
title.zh: Anthropic 发布 Claude Agent 延迟基准测试套件

summary.en: Claude Ops released an open benchmark to profile perception, planning, and action latencies across orchestration stacks.
summary.zh: Claude Ops 团队开源了一套基准，用于衡量不同编排框架从感知、规划到执行的端到端延迟。

title.en: EU proposes audit trail rules for autonomous agents
title.zh: 欧盟提议针对自主 Agent 的审计追踪新规

summary.en: A draft regulation would require transparent logging and reversible actions for high-autonomy systems deployed in Europe.
summary.zh: 最新草案要求在欧洲部署的高自治 Agent 必须具备透明日志与可逆操作能力。
